engChrName: Renne! Renne!
engSearchText: Renne! Renne!
jpnChrName: 先輩……！　レン先輩……！
jpnSearchText: 先輩……！　レン先輩……！

engChrName: Cross... Help me, Cross...
engSearchText: Cross... Help me, Cross...
jpnChrName: ……クロス、助けてよクロス……
jpnSearchText: ……クロス、助けてよクロス……

engChrName: Thank you very much I'm very happy I hope you enjoyed yourself please come again.
engSearchText:
Thank you very much I'm very happy I hope you
enjoyed yourself please come again.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございますウレシイですタノしんで もらえましたかマタいらしてください……
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございますウレシイですタノしんで
もらえましたかマタいらしてください……

engChrName: Mama... Papa... Where are you...?
engSearchText: Mama... Papa... Where are you...?
jpnChrName: どこ……パパ……ママ……
jpnSearchText: どこ……パパ……ママ……

engChrName: Lo... Josh... Est... Ti...
engSearchText: Lo... Josh... Est... Ti...
jpnSearchText:
レー………ヨシュ………
………エス………ティ…………

engChrName: Why? Why can't I remember...?
engSearchText: Why? Why can't I remember...?
jpnChrName: ドウして……ナンデ思い出せ………
jpnSearchText: ドウして……ナンデ思い出せ………
っ……

engChrName: Their names are Estelle, Joshua, Tita, and Loewe!
engSearchText: Their names are Estelle, Joshua, Tita, and Loewe!
jpnChrName: ──エステルさんにヨシュアさん、 ティータさんにレーヴェさんでしょう！？
jpnSearchText:
──エステルさんにヨシュアさん、
ティータさんにレーヴェさんでしょう！？

engChrName: You have to come back to us, Renne! Please—we're here for you!
engSearchText:
You have to come back to us, Renne!
Please—we're here for you!
jpnChrName: 戻ってきてくださいレン先輩！ まずは私たちのところに──！！
jpnSearchText:
戻ってきてくださいレン先輩！
まずは私たちのところに──！！
………ぁ……………

engChrName: Oh, how foolish... I let it get the better of me.
engSearchText: Oh, how foolish... I let it get the better of me.
jpnChrName: いけないいけない…… ……つい持ってかれてたわ……
jpnSearchText:
いけないいけない……
……つい持ってかれてたわ……

engChrName: I wonder...if these spheres...
engSearchText: I wonder...if these spheres...
jpnChrName: なるほど……この魔球はもしかして……
jpnSearchText: なるほど……この魔球はもしかして……

engChrName: Renne!
engSearchText: Renne!
jpnChrName: レン先輩……！
jpnSearchText: レン先輩……！

engChrName: Agnès, no! Get back!
engSearchText: Agnès, no! Get back!
jpnChrName: いけないアニエス── 下がりなさい……！
jpnSearchText:
いけないアニエス──
下がりなさい……！

engChrName: Argh!
engSearchText: Argh!
jpnChrName: あうっ……
jpnSearchText: あうっ……

engChrName: Aaah!
engSearchText: Aaah!
jpnChrName: きゃああっ……
jpnSearchText: きゃああっ……

engChrName: You have to stay away, Agnès! Right now it's focused on me!
engSearchText:
You have to stay away, Agnès! Right now it's focused
on me!
jpnChrName: は、離れなさいアニエス…… こいつの興味は私に移った……
jpnSearchText:
は、離れなさいアニエス……
こいつの興味は私に移った……

engChrName: I'll try and hold out until help comes!
engSearchText: I'll try and hold out until help comes!
jpnChrName: 何とか凌げばそのうち助けが……
jpnSearchText: 何とか凌げばそのうち助けが……

engChrName: I... I won't! I want to keep those I care about safe by my own hand!
engSearchText:
I... I won't! I want to keep those I care about safe by
my own hand!
jpnChrName: で、できませんっ……！ 大切な人はこの手で守りたいんです！
jpnSearchText:
で、できませんっ……！
大切な人はこの手で守りたいんです！

engChrName: Just like you and Van always have!
engSearchText: Just like you and Van always have!
jpnChrName: 先輩やヴァンさんたちみたいに……！
jpnSearchText: 先輩やヴァンさんたちみたいに……！
……ぁ…………

engChrName: Heh. Growin' up right before my eyes!
engSearchText: Heh. Growin' up right before my eyes!
jpnChrName: ハッ…… 言うようになったじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
言うようになったじゃねえか！

engChrName: Ah...
engSearchText: Ah...

engChrName: Heehee. You took your time, my prince... Zin's here, too?
engSearchText:
Heehee. You took your time, my prince... Zin's
here, too?
jpnChrName: ふふ……遅いじゃない王子様…… ……ってジンさんまで………
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……遅いじゃない王子様……
……ってジンさんまで………

engChrName: Heehee. You took your time, my prince... Walter's here, too?
engSearchText:
Heehee. You took your time, my prince...
Walter's here, too?
jpnChrName: ふふ……遅いじゃない王子様…… ……ってヴァルターまで………
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……遅いじゃない王子様……
……ってヴァルターまで………

engChrName: Sorry for the wait, Agnès!
engSearchText: Sorry for the wait, Agnès!
jpnChrName: アニエスさん、お待たせしました！
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん、お待たせしました！

engChrName: Wow. Not often we get to see YOU in a bind!
engSearchText: Wow. Not often we get to see YOU in a bind!
jpnChrName: ハッ、チート娘も 珍しくピンチみてぇだな！
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、チート娘も
珍しくピンチみてぇだな！

engChrName: You did great, Renne! Now leave the rest to us!
engSearchText: You did great, Renne! Now leave the rest to us!
jpnChrName: よく凌いだレン、後は任せろ！
jpnSearchText: よく凌いだレン、後は任せろ！

engChrName: Hahaha! C'mon! This ain't like you one bit, Renne!
engSearchText: Hahaha! C'mon! This ain't like you one bit, Renne!
jpnChrName: クカカ！ らしくねえじゃねえか、レン！
jpnSearchText:
クカカ！
らしくねえじゃねえか、レン！

engChrName: Here we go!
engSearchText: Here we go!
jpnChrName: 来るぞ──！
jpnSearchText: 来るぞ──！

engChrName: One large and four medium-sized foes!
engSearchText: One large and four medium-sized foes!
jpnChrName: 大型１、中型４です！
jpnSearchText: 大型１、中型４です！

engChrName: You sure you're up to this?
engSearchText: You sure you're up to this?
jpnChrName: おい、大丈夫なのか……！？
jpnSearchText: おい、大丈夫なのか……！？

engChrName: I'm a little tired, but I'm fine. Please, let me fight with you!
engSearchText:
I'm a little tired, but I'm fine. Please, let me fight
with you!
jpnChrName: 少し疲れただけです…… どうか私も戦わせてください！
jpnSearchText:
少し疲れただけです……
どうか私も戦わせてください！

engChrName: I want to protect what I hold dear—as a proud part-timer at Arkride Solutions!
engSearchText:
I want to protect what I hold dear—as a proud
part-timer at Arkride Solutions!
jpnChrName: 解決事務所の一員として── 大切なものをこの手で守るために！
jpnSearchText:
解決事務所の一員として──
大切なものをこの手で守るために！

engChrName: Agnès!
engSearchText: Agnès!
jpnChrName: アニエスさん……！
jpnSearchText: アニエスさん……！

engChrName: Unbelievable...
engSearchText: Unbelievable...
jpnChrName: ……まったく………
jpnSearchText: ……まったく………

engChrName: Got'cha. Then go ahead and show off, Agnès!
engSearchText: Got'cha. Then go ahead and show off, Agnès!
jpnChrName: 上等だ── 気合を入れろよアニエス！
jpnSearchText:
上等だ──
気合を入れろよアニエス！

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: はいっ……！
jpnSearchText: はいっ……！

engChrName: Oh!
engSearchText: Oh!

engChrName: Nice. We did it, huh?
engSearchText: Nice. We did it, huh?
jpnChrName: フッ、やったか。
jpnSearchText: フッ、やったか。

engChrName: Get outta our faces, ya damn ball.
engSearchText: Get outta our faces, ya damn ball.
jpnChrName: ハッ、逝けやクソ球。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、逝けやクソ球。

engChrName: Phew... We can finally get out of here.
engSearchText: Phew... We can finally get out of here.
jpnChrName: フフ…… ……やっと戻れるわね……
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
……やっと戻れるわね……

engChrName: Yeah. I've got you.
engSearchText: Yeah. I've got you.
jpnChrName: ああ……掴まってろ。
jpnSearchText: ああ……掴まってろ。

engChrName: Why, Mom...? Why, Dad...?
engSearchText: Why, Mom...? Why, Dad...?
jpnChrName: どうして……… ……パパ……ママ………
jpnSearchText:
どうして………
……パパ……ママ………

engChrName: I don't...want this... I don't want to be...
engSearchText: I don't...want this... I don't want to be...
jpnChrName: ………わたし………ぼく………… ……──しになんかになりたく………
jpnSearchText:
………わたし………ぼく…………
……──しになんかになりたく………

engChrName: Quatre! Hang in there, Quatre!
engSearchText: Quatre! Hang in there, Quatre!
jpnChrName: カトル君……！？ 大丈夫、しっかりして……！
jpnSearchText:
カトル君……！？
大丈夫、しっかりして……！

engChrName: Please don't cry! We're here for you!
engSearchText: Please don't cry! We're here for you!
jpnChrName: カトルー、なかないでー！ ユメたちがついてるから～！
jpnSearchText:
カトルー、なかないでー！
ユメたちがついてるから～！

engChrName: Sorry for the wait, you three!
engSearchText: Sorry for the wait, you three!
jpnChrName: 待たせたな──３人とも！
jpnSearchText: 待たせたな──３人とも！

engChrName: Y-You're here!
engSearchText: Y-You're here!
jpnChrName: み、みんな……！
jpnSearchText: み、みんな……！

engChrName: Oh! Everybody's here!
engSearchText: Oh! Everybody's here!
jpnChrName: あー、ヴァンたちだー！
jpnSearchText: あー、ヴァンたちだー！

engChrName: Yumé! Thank goodness you're okay!
engSearchText: Yumé! Thank goodness you're okay!
jpnChrName: ユメちゃん、よかった……！
jpnSearchText: ユメちゃん、よかった……！

engChrName: Quatre! Paulette!
engSearchText: Quatre! Paulette!
jpnChrName: カトル君にポーレットさんも……！
jpnSearchText: カトル君にポーレットさんも……！

engChrName: The heroes of justice are here to save the day!
engSearchText: The heroes of justice are here to save the day!
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… 正義のミカタが助けにきたわよ！
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
正義のミカタが助けにきたわよ！

engChrName: Can you handle this, Master?
engSearchText: Can you handle this, Master?
jpnChrName: 師父（せんせい）、頼みます！
jpnSearchText: 師父（せんせい）、頼みます！

engChrName: Gladly!
engSearchText: Gladly!
jpnChrName: 承知──！
jpnSearchText: 承知──！

engChrName: Return!
engSearchText: Return!

jpnSearchText: っ……！？

engChrName: Where am I...? Right... That giant sphere absorbed us, then...
engSearchText:
Where am I...? Right... That giant sphere absorbed
us, then...
jpnChrName: ここって── そうだ、魔球に呑み込まれて……！
jpnSearchText:
ここって──
そうだ、魔球に呑み込まれて……！

engChrName: Bergard! Van! You all came for me!
engSearchText: Bergard! Van! You all came for me!
jpnChrName: ベルガルドさん……ヴァンさんたち！
jpnSearchText: ベルガルドさん……ヴァンさんたち！

engChrName: Of course we did.
engSearchText: Of course we did.
jpnChrName: カトル君、よかった……！
jpnSearchText: カトル君、よかった……！

engChrName: Yep. Time to wake up, sleepyhead!
engSearchText: Yep. Time to wake up, sleepyhead!
jpnChrName: ハッ、盛大に寝ぼけてたみてーだな！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、盛大に寝ぼけてたみてーだな！

engChrName: Quatre is back!
engSearchText: Quatre is back!
jpnChrName: カトル、戻ッタ……！
jpnSearchText: カトル、戻ッタ……！

engChrName: RUFF!
engSearchText: RUFF!
jpnChrName: ＢＯＷＷＯＷ！
jpnSearchText: ＢＯＷＷＯＷ！

engChrName: Was it you two who led everyone here, then? Thank you... It looks like we're not out of the woods yet, huh?
engSearchText:
Was it you two who led everyone here, then?
Thank you... It looks like we're not out of the
woods yet, huh?
jpnChrName: そうか、お前たちがヴァンさんを…… ……ここが踏ん張り所みたいだね！
jpnSearchText:
そうか、お前たちがヴァンさんを……
……ここが踏ん張り所みたいだね！

engChrName: On your guard! They're about to strike!
engSearchText: On your guard! They're about to strike!
jpnChrName: 気をつけて──来ます！
jpnSearchText: 気をつけて──来ます！

engChrName: We'll see about that!
engSearchText: We'll see about that!
jpnChrName: ああ、ケリを付けるぞ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、ケリを付けるぞ！

engChrName: Are you sure you're up for this?
engSearchText: Are you sure you're up for this?
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫なんですかっ？
jpnSearchText: だ、大丈夫なんですかっ？

engChrName: Of course. I had an awful nightmare, but a good sleep is sometimes just what you need to wash away the fatigue!
engSearchText:
Of course. I had an awful nightmare, but a good sleep
is sometimes just what you need to wash away
the fatigue!
jpnChrName: ああ──酷い夢だったけど 体力は回復できたみたいだ……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ──酷い夢だったけど
体力は回復できたみたいだ……！

engChrName: Time to make this thing pay!
engSearchText: Time to make this thing pay!
jpnChrName: せめて落とし前を付けないとね！
jpnSearchText: せめて落とし前を付けないとね！

engChrName: Good—'cause I'm up for that!
engSearchText: Good—'cause I'm up for that!
jpnChrName: ハッ、上等だ！
jpnSearchText: ハッ、上等だ！

engChrName: I'll back you up all I can!
engSearchText: I'll back you up all I can!
jpnChrName: わたくし達もサポートします！
jpnSearchText: わたくし達もサポートします！
